title: PM lauds ADB’s support in Pakistan’s socio-economic development
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 14 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday appreciated the Asian Development Bank (ADB) for its support to the government in the socio-economic development of Pakistan.
The Prime Minister was talking to Vice President of ADB Mr. Shixin Chen, who called on here.
Vice President of ADB appreciated the government’s handling of COVID-19 crisis and said that Pakistan’s economy has been much better than many countries during the pandemic situation.
He assured the Prime Minister that ADB would continue to support Pakistan in its endeavors to accelerate the country’s economic growth.
